entry.title: Unit tests
entry.summary: In an email exchange between John Smith and Matt, John is having trouble building the unit test framework for Bitcoin. He shares a command he used to build it and includes an error message indicating that there is an undefined reference to main. He provides two ways to fix the issue - either add #define BOOST_TEST_DYN_LINK to the top of test_bitcoin.cpp or link boost_unit_test_framework statically. Matt responds with a reference to pull requests 363 and 442.
